term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - quadrupole splitting in Mössbauer spectroscopy
term.title: quadrupole splitting

item.text: The measured Doppler velocity difference between the two peaks seen in quadrupole split spectra from nuclides such as 57Fe and 119Sn.

sources.item: PAC, 1976, 45, 211. 'Nomenclature and Conventions for Reporting Mössbauer Spectroscopic Data' on page 214 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac197645030211)
